titles.title: Providing for consideration of the bill (H.R. 725) to amend title 28, United States Code, to prevent fraudulent joinder.
Providing for consideration of the bill (H.R. 725) to amend title 28, United States Code, to prevent fraudulent joinder.

action.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 115-27, by Mr. Buck.
Rule providing for consideration of H.R. 725

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 17.

action.text: DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate on H. Res. 175.
On ordering the previous question Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 230 - 184 (Roll no. 129).

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by recorded vote: 235 - 185 (Roll no. 130).

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: Sets forth the rule for consideration of the bill (H.R. 725) to amend title 28, United States Code, to prevent fraudulent joinder.
